title: experiment
content:
hi all,  
im doing somesort of an experiment,and i would like to consult  
with you,  
and it goes like this:  
ill post some sounds files of words in hebrew  
and the idea is to get from ppl here,some sort of  
graphic/typographic visuals relate to the sounds  
without knowing its meaning.  
the next step is to post the same words written in hebrew  
again without the meaning,and to get again visual translation  
which can be anything,from images to forms or to something u pick up from the street.

i would like also to know if you think the order should be first  
the written words and the the sounds,and if the words should be serif or sanserif  
just pop up an idea to split it,on other forum ill post the oppsite from here.

thank you,ill post it soon

 [‹ Fads](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811072623/http:/typophile.com/node/20652 "Go to previous forum topic") [Word into Art at The British Museum ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811072623/http:/typophile.com/node/20656 "Go to next forum topic")
author: g_u_y_t

comments.content: You might as well post Yellow Billed Cookoo Sounds and it would make as much sense.
